basics.name: Deacon Jones
basics.label: Maintenance and Machine Operator
basics.summary: Maintenance shipper/receiver with over a decade of heavy machinery experience looking to further my skills.

work.name: Stephenson's Rental Services
work.summary: Started at Stephenson's Rental as a delivery driver for two years before being promoted to building maintenance.
responsibilities: Ensured loads were safely secured while on route to customers.
Ensured safe work practices were upheld.
Other responsibilities including: inspected truck before loading, performed routine equipment checks, etc.
Shipped products to storage, customers and other store branches.
Carefully loaded and unloaded (hand bombing) construction equipment.

work.name: Lowe's Home Improvement
work.summary: Handled sales and merchandise of lumber, electrical, hardware and plumbing.
responsibilities: Assisted customers with inquiries about store products.
Operated heavy machinery for loading and offloading merchandise.
Stayed informed on new products and their technical applications.
Worked in accordance with the store's policies and procedures on loss prevetion and health and safety.

work.name: J.H. Secord
work.summary: Repair and maintenance of garage doors and loading docks.
responsibilities: General maintenance of warehouse, entry doors and garage mechanisms.
